Sentencas: Maintaining temperature profile in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is one of the essential issues that need to be addressed during the load tracking.
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: In this paper, a novel control scheme with three-loop structure is developed to mitigate SOFC temperature profile variation.
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: This scheme can simply implemented by three variable-speed blowers.
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: The first blower is an anode recirculation blower used to maintain anode inlet temperature, the second one is a cathode recirculation blower used to maintain cathode inlet temperature, and the last one is an air blower used to maintain cathode outlet temperature.
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: Compared with other simple schemes with only one-loop or two-loop structure, the scheme with three-loop structure achieves the best performance in mitigating SOFC internal temperature profile variation and guaranteeing a safe margin on operation limits.
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: With a 10% system load step drop, the three-loop control scheme presents the best performance in rapidity and stability, with a much smaller overshoot, a much shorter settling time, and the smallest ITAE criterion.
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: The SOFC temperature profile variation is also smallest (deviating within 4.7 K).
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: Time-dependent temperature gradient is much less than 3.0 K/min.
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: Temperature gradient is significant less than 10 K/cm.
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: Steam to carbon ratio is also kept more than 2.0.
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: Furthermore, the three-loop control scheme can perform high system efficiency, which reaches 53.9% at the 90% load.
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Sentencas: As a result, the three-loop SOFC temperature control scheme is robust in safe and efficient operation.(c) 2022 The Author(s).
Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System
A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System

Titulo: A novel control scheme to mitigate temperature profile variation in a SOFC System
